name: visual-db
tagline: A self-hosted database visualization tool for schema diagrams and management

features.title: Database Visualization
features.description: Display table relationships and schema structure in interactive diagrams for better understanding

features.title: Schema Management
features.description: Create, modify, and delete tables and columns using visual tools instead of SQL commands

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Generate SQL scripts or export data to CSV for backup and migration purposes

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Share database diagrams and queries with team members for coordinated development work
